author: boobshart
name: Loki Transparent
description:
Took the awesome Loki theme, made the panel transparent and changed a few other colors and things so it looks better that way. I don't want to take all the credit, about 99.9999% of this theme comes from the original Loki, check it out here: http://cinnamon-spices.linuxmint.com/themes/view/145

This is my first time ever working on cinnamon themes, if you have any suggestions let me know, esp. on tumblr or deviantart at boobshart.

-----------------------------------------------

1.0 - Theme created

1.1 - Added bar to window list when hovered over
